CustomField.description:
All content displayed must have published = true. This can be used to allow temporary content, previews in QA, and other tricks.
This must not change in production once the site is live.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
All content displayed must have published = true. This can be used to allow temporary content, previews in QA, and other tricks.
This must not change in production once the site is live.
CustomField.label: Show only Published content
